resources.string: If you let the Jumplings scape from the lower edge of the screen you\'ll lose a life! As this was the first time we let it pass…
If you kill Jumplings very quickly you score a combo!
That\'s it, tap on the Jumplings before they fall from the lower bottom of the screen.
Careful with the orange ones, they need two taps to be killed.
The yellow ones split when you tap on them!
Bombs are not meant to be tapped! Not this time, but next you\'ll lose a life.
You\'ve got the blade! Swipe through the screen to use it… and be careful, it will only last for a few seconds!
The blade is over… now tap on them, us usual…
Tap the Jumplings before they fall from the bottom of the screen. Don\'t let them fall, or you\'ll lose one life.
Kill the Jumplings very quickly one after the other to score combos and gain extra points.
The yellow ones split when you tap on them
Do not explode the bombs. That is obvious…
Ninja sable powerup. When you got it you can swipe through the screen to kill them faster. Lasts only for some seconds.
The game integrates the adaptation of Box2D for Android made by Badlogic
Some sound samples and bitmaps were taken from the free source game Teeworlds and heavily modified.
